page.title: 08LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS
page.content: We visited the old {Courtauld Mill}on July 12 1985.We met Mr.Kaln who is going to be the manager and is the chief builder as well as owning the place. He said that he wanted to have a restaurant,antiques and an art and craft shop.They are going to serve all sorts of foods on the ground floor.On the first floor there will be garden ware,on the second art and craft goods and on the top floor just antiques. The walls are still criss_crossed with the original Corsican Pine which is about 300 years old. We also saw the original water wheel which will be installed in the new restaurant. There is a simple crane which is as old as the mill.
